author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Watch Live: President Trump’s Coronavirus Task Force Holds Press Conference
description: The president and his team continue to talk about the fight to contain the spread of the virus as well as support Americans suffering the economic effects of the global pandemic.
content:
President Donald Trumps coronavirus task force will host a press briefing at the White House on Thursday, scheduled for 6:00 p.m. EST.
The president and his team continue to talk about the fight to contain the spread of the virus as well as support Americans… [+481 chars]
